@mic_co

it's fine, it was one of my first uploads so i hadly knew what i was doing.

Just select all the rar archives, right click the first one and then select extract here. it'll extract 3 folders, and you move those into your borderlands game folder and over right.

If you have any more questions, feel free to ask

What do I do with the files that aren't in rars? For example, rld-bl41.r30 through 41

@404ninja
Chances are that they are indeed RAR files. Probably just doesnt have an icon assoicated with them - winRAR only makes file associations for the first 30x (.r00 - .r29).
